org.apache.paimon.mergetree.compact

Class UniversalCompaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.mergetree.compact.UniversalCompaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompactStrategy

    public class UniversalCompaction
extends Object
implements CompactStrategy
    Universal Compaction Style is a compaction style, targeting the use cases requiring lower write amplification, trading off read amplification and space amplification.

    See RocksDb Universal-Compaction: https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/wiki/Universal-Compaction.

    • Method Detail

      • pick

        public Optional<CompactUnit> pick(int numLevels,
                                  List<LevelSortedRun> runs)
        Description copied from interface: CompactStrategy
        Pick compaction unit from runs.
        • compaction is runs-based, not file-based.
        • level 0 is special, one run per file; all other levels are one run per level.
        • compaction is sequential from small level to large level.
        Specified by:
        pick in interface CompactStrategy

      • pickForSizeRatio

                                    List<LevelSortedRun> runs,
                                    int candidateCount,
                                    boolean forcePick)
